description: Try our easy to follow Zoodles with Tomato Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Zoodles with Tomato Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a spiraliser, cut zucchini into noodles. Blanch in boiling water for 12 minutes or until just tender. Drain well. Divide zoodles into bowls. Top with pesto and scatter with extra tomatoes, basil and parmesan. Serve immediately.
